user.name: TJ Thinakaran (he/him)
user.description: Cofounder @EZTexting . Blogging at https://t.co/BY0ih8nUal

fullText:
Vibe coding is an unfortunate name. You’re not vibing, you’re wrestling. With a machine smarter and faster than you’ll ever be.

You’re just trying to get it to do what’s in your head, and somehow it makes even the best of us feel stupid. It’s exhausting. And it’s exhilarating.
